features.name: Landing Page / Home
features.description: Welcome page with introduction to the Sign Language Interpreter application and feature overview

ui_elements.description: Feature cards showing Detect, Translate, and History capabilities

features.name: Real-time Sign Language Detection
features.description: Webcam-based sign language detection with real-time prediction and confidence scores

ui_elements.description: Webcam video feed for capturing sign language gestures
Start/Stop Detection button to control webcam capture
Detection results showing detected phrase and confidence percentage

user_flow: Perform sign language gesture in front of camera
View detected phrase with confidence score
See alternative predictions ranked by confidence

features.name: Language Translation
features.description: Multi-language translation of detected sign language phrases

ui_elements.description: Language selector dropdown for choosing target translation language

features.name: Detection History
features.description: Historical record of all detected signs with timestamps, confidence scores, and translations

ui_elements.description: History table with columns: Time, Detected Phrase, Confidence, Translation, Language
Clear History button to delete all history records
Empty state message when no history exists

user_flow: View list of all previously detected signs
See timestamps, phrases, confidence scores, and translations
Optionally clear history with confirmation dialog

features.name: Backend Health Check
features.description: Monitor backend API connectivity status and display connection status to user

ui_elements.description: Visual connection status indicator (green for connected, red for disconnected)

functionality: Check backend health endpoint on app load
Periodically check backend status every 10 seconds
Show visual feedback to user about backend availability

features.name: Responsive Navigation
features.description: Side navigation bar for switching between different application sections

ui_elements.description: Tab buttons for navigating between sections
Visual icons for each navigation tab
